Detailed Description

This class implements the HorizonShadowMap interface for the second generation of terrain.

HorizonShadowMap2::ImageType const & HorizonShadowMap2::image (  )  const [virtual]

This function accesses the HorizonShadowMap2 as though it is an image.

This function should only be called within a lock/unlock pair.

Returns:
The HorizonShadowMap2 as an image.

This function should only be called within a lock/unlock pair.

bool HorizonShadowMap2::load ( DataSectionPtr  dataSection,
std::string *  error = NULL 
) [virtual]

This function loads the HorizonShadowMap2 from a DataSection that was saved via HorizonShadowMap2::save.

You should not call this between lock/unlock pairs.

Parameters:
dataSection The DataSection to load from.
error If not NULL and an error occurs then this will be set to a reason why the error occured.
Returns:
True if the load was successful.

Implements Terrain::TerrainMap< TYPE >.

bool HorizonShadowMap2::lock ( bool  readOnly  ) 

This function locks the HorizonShadowMap2 to memory and enables it for editing.

Parameters:
readOnly This is a hint to the locking. If true then we are only reading values from the map.
Returns:
True if the lock is successful, false otherwise.

bool HorizonShadowMap2::save ( DataSectionPtr  pSection  )  const

This function saves the underlying data to a DataSection that can be read back in via load.

You should not call this between lock/unlock pairs.

Parameters:
pSection The DataSection to save to.

HorizonShadowPixel HorizonShadowMap2::shadowAt ( int32  x,
int32  z 
) const [virtual]

This function determines the shadow at the given point.

Parameters:
x The x coordinate to get the shadow at.
z The z coordinate to get the shadow at.
Returns:
The shadow at x, z.

Implements Terrain::HorizonShadowMap.
